keywordsWithResponses.response: Oh, I wouldn't know too much about that my dear, but it's not my first time here.
O ho ho! Yes, poor little soul - my report seemed to be a little too...much.

dialogue.text: Look at you working so hard, what a good little soul you are!
You'll find them on your desk, I presume.

evidence:
You find a random note amongst her documents:

“The person handling the report had to suddenly
resign after filing Mrs. Jenkins’ documents. 
We haven’t heard from them since. Weird.”

-----------------------------------
 Cryptic Resignation Note
-----------------------------------
To Whom It May Concern,

I regret to inform you that I must tender my
resignation, effective immediately.
My time here has been both enlightening
and harrowing. However, recent events have
led me to realize that I have seen too much.
There are depths to this organization's sinners
violent crimes that I fear I can no longer
navigate without sacrificing my own sanity and safety.

I leave behind this message as a warning to those
who dare to delve too deep. I hope you get to live
another day and leave ASAP.

Sincerely,

[REDACTED]
